SEARCH
Package org.biopax.validator.api

Interface Validator

public interface Validator
Object model validator.
Author:
rodche

    Method

    Associates a model, element, or stream with the validation result.

  • Method Details

    • getRules

      Set<Rule<?>> getRules()
      Gets all the active validation rules.
      Returns:
      available (loaded) validation rules

    • getResults

      Collection<org.biopax.validator.api.beans.Validation> getResults()
      Gets all the registered validation results (where error cases get stored).
      Returns:
      results

    • importModel

      void importModel(org.biopax.validator.api.beans.Validation validation, InputStream inputStream)
      Associates a validation report with the data and creates in-memory model. The validation result is object where all the problems related to this data instance are collected.
      Parameters:
      validation - validation result object
      inputStream - data input stream

    • associate

      void associate(Object element, org.biopax.validator.api.beans.Validation validation)
      Associates a model, element, or stream with the validation result. Some errors may occur during the data import and parsing before the model is created, e.g., in XML headers, software bugs. We want to report these problems as well.
      Parameters:
      element - object (e.g., existing Model)
      validation - results object

    • indirectlyAssociate

      void indirectlyAssociate(Object parent, Object child)
      Associates, e.g., a property value with validation results by using the 'parent' element to find it. This allows for errors to be reported while model is being read, maybe before the child element is added to the model.
      Parameters:
      parent - model element
      child - value

    • findValidation

      Collection<org.biopax.validator.api.beans.Validation> findValidation(Object obj)
      Given the object, finds the corresponding validations (that it's been associated with).
      Parameters:
      obj - a model, element or even I/O handler
      Returns:
      validation results

    • validate

      void validate(org.biopax.validator.api.beans.Validation validation)
      Post-model validation. The result also includes other problems that might occur during the model initialization and creation.
      Parameters:
      validation - results object

    • report

      void report(Object obj, String errorCode, String reportedBy, boolean isFixed, Object... args)
      Adds the validation error (with proper attributes) to registered validation objects associated with the object.
      Parameters:
      obj - object associated with a validation result (can be even stream, during import, but usually is a model element)
      errorCode - error code
      reportedBy - class name of a validation rule or a name of another validating class or method (AOP aspect method, jointpoint).
      isFixed - if true, - find and set the attribute
      args - additional message parameters (details)
